parameters.name: PlayerId
parameters.documentation: The player the house belongs to.

parameters.name: UpgradeLevel
parameters.documentation: The upgrade level of the house.

parameters.name: IsFinished
parameters.documentation: Specifies if the house is completely built. `0` means construction site; `1` that the house is built.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.documentation: The object id which allows the house to be referenced by missions. Normally `0`.
